snippet.title: Crowned Demo, September2021
snippet.description:
iOS:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/crowned-moba/id1582661940

Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=gg.moba.crowned

The only mobile-first MOBA in the market.

Crowned is the ultimate esports experience on your smartphone.

Free, fair and instant 1v1, 2v2 and 3v3 battles in the most popular esports genre. Play online with / against your friends. 5-10 minutes of session time.

Crowned is an innovative MOBA game, combining stunningly simple mobile controls with deeply strategic & tactical gameplay. Brought down to the essence of esports: High tension from the first second, ultra addictive competition, wrapped in quick matches. A mobile-first MOBA game: Enjoy esports anytime, anywhere.

RULES:

Two teams. One king each. The king must not die.

FEATURES:

● Simple, unique and intuitive mobile-first controls.
● Intense MOBA experience within popular multiplayer online battle arena setting: Champions, skills, lanes, minions, towers and bases.
● More than 100 champions (we're working on them!) to choose from with deeply tactical and strategic special abilities. Which champion is yours?
● More than 5 different maps (we're working on them!) for you to unleash your best strategy.
● Innovative game rules: Lead your team to victory and dominate the opponents by capturing the crown of their king. You can only see who's king by killing them!
● Esports for anyone: Grab your phone and participate in exciting esports tournaments. Build a clan with your friends and ladder in the community. Purely skill-based gameplay. Only practice makes you better.
● Esports for professionals: We're working setting up the professional esports structure around the game, including leagues, teams, anti-cheat systems and organized, global competitions with prize money. We can't wait to be announcing one of the most innovative feature in esports history soon. If you love competition - stay tuned!!!
● Let's build the best MOBA together: Join our fast-growing community and leave us feedback. We listen.

Have fun.

Your Crowned-Team.

NOTE:

● It's an online game. You'll need internet connection to play it.
● We're in an early development stage working on further features.
● Your feedback is welcome: Let's build the best MOBA together.

FEEDBACK:

● Email: get@crowned.gg
● Discord: https://discord.com/invite/P4nCWjsAEd

WEBSITE:

https://crowned.gg
